headline.main: Clooney, Mayor to Help Open 1 World Trade Center Observatory
headline.print_headline: Clooney, Mayor to Help Open 1 World Trade Center Observatory

docs.snippet: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio (dih BLAH'-zee-oh), George Clooney and Anderson Cooper are helping to open the new observatory at One World Trade Center....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio (dih BLAH'-zee-oh), George Clooney and Anderson Cooper are helping to open the new observatory at One World Trade Center.

headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Fared on Monday
headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Fared on Monday

docs.snippet: The stock market crept to a record high in a quiet session on Monday. Investors had little news to weigh because most major companies have finished reporting first-quarter results....
docs.lead_paragraph: The stock market crept to a record high in a quiet session on Monday. Investors had little news to weigh because most major companies have finished reporting first-quarter results.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank Retail Chief Neske Will Quit: Handelsblatt
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Retail Chief Neske Will Quit: Handelsblatt

docs.snippet: Deutsche Bank's retail banking chief Rainer Neske will resign because he opposes the lender's restructuring program, Handelsblatt reported on Monday, citing unnamed sources in the finance industry....
docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank's retail banking chief Rainer Neske will resign because he opposes the lender's restructuring program, Handelsblatt reported on Monday, citing unnamed sources in the finance industry.

headline.main: Waco Shootout Puts Spotlight on Motorcycle Club Culture
headline.print_headline: Waco Shootout Puts Spotlight on Motorcycle Club Culture

docs.snippet: Former undercover agent Jay Dobyns says people can be forgiven for thinking Sunday's biker bloodbath in Waco, Texas, was a throwback to a bad 1970s movie....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former undercover agent Jay Dobyns says people can be forgiven for thinking Sunday's biker bloodbath in Waco, Texas, was a throwback to a bad 1970s movie.

headline.main: At least 40 dead, dozens missing in Colombian landslide
headline.sub: At least 40 dead, dozens missing in Colombian landslide

docs.snippet: A survivor of the Colombia landslide tells his wife, "let's hug and hope to God that it doesn't take our house and that we are saved." Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A survivor of the Colombia landslide tells his wife, "let's hug and hope to God that it doesn't take our house and that we are saved." Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

headline.main: 'Grand Theft Auto' Publisher Take-Two's Profit Sails Past Street
headline.print_headline: 'Grand Theft Auto' Publisher Take-Two's Profit Sails Past Street

docs.snippet: Video game publisher Take-Two Interactive Software Inc, reported an 83.5 percent jump in quarterly adjusted revenue, helped by strong sales of "Grand Theft Auto V" and "NBA 2K15"....
docs.lead_paragraph: Video game publisher Take-Two Interactive Software Inc, reported an 83.5 percent jump in quarterly adjusted revenue, helped by strong sales of "Grand Theft Auto V" and "NBA 2K15".

headline.main: California Lawyer Tried to Help Maternity Tourism Witness Flee: Prosecutors
headline.print_headline: California Lawyer Tried to Help Maternity Tourism Witness Flee: Prosecutors

docs.snippet: An immigration attorney accused of agreeing to help a woman flee the country after she was designated a material witness in an investigation into so-called maternity hotels in Southern California has been arrested on federal charges, prosecutors s...
docs.lead_paragraph: An immigration attorney accused of agreeing to help a woman flee the country after she was designated a material witness in an investigation into so-called maternity hotels in Southern California has been arrested on federal charges, prosecutors said on Monday.

headline.main: Senate Rejects More Aid for Workers Who Lose Jobs to Trade
headline.print_headline: Senate Rejects More Aid for Workers Who Lose Jobs to Trade

docs.snippet: Majority Leader Mitch McConnell is vowing to postpone the Senate's scheduled Memorial Day recess until lawmakers pass a trade bill that President Barack Obama wants, vote on renewing the Patriot Act and keep highway construction funds flowing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Majority Leader Mitch McConnell is vowing to postpone the Senate's scheduled Memorial Day recess until lawmakers pass a trade bill that President Barack Obama wants, vote on renewing the Patriot Act and keep highway construction funds flowing.
